scenes.description: Houshou Marine performs a song from the 'Gensokyo Holoism' project.
Gawr Gura performs her original song 'Reflect' as part of the medley.
Nekomata Okayu performs Inugami Korone's song 'Doggy Diggy' as a shuffle cover.
Inugami Korone performs Nekomata Okayu's song 'Mogu Mogu YUMMY!' as a shuffle cover.
The hololive members perform 'Bright Parade' as the grand finale of the Shuffle Medley 2024.
